AI Concierge Available

Get instant answers 24/7

Our AI-powered concierge can help you find the perfect cigar, answer questions about our products, and provide personalized recommendations based on your preferences.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I know which cigar is right for me?

Our AI concierge analyzes your preferences and taste profile to recommend the perfect cigars. You can also consult with our expert tobacconists.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we ship to over 45 countries worldwide. Shipping times and customs regulations vary by destination.

How are cigars stored during shipping?

All cigars are shipped in humidity-controlled packaging to ensure they arrive in perfect condition.

What is your return policy?

We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee on all purchases. Unopened boxes can be returned for a full refund.

Visit Our Flagship Store

Experience our collection in person at our Miami showroom, featuring a walk-in humidor, tasting lounge, and expert consultations.
